index.html.contents:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src='https://unpkg.com/aframe-curve-component/dist/aframe-curve-component.min.js'></script>
		<script src='https://rawgit.com/mayognaise/aframe-mouse-cursor-component/master/dist/aframe-mouse-cursor-component.min.js'></script>
		<script src='script.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene background='color: whitesmoke' fog='color: whitesmoke; far: 15' cursor='rayOrigin: mouse' raycaster='objects: .clickable'>
			<a-assets>
				<a-mixin id='grey' material='color: dimgrey'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='fov' visible='false' geometry='radius: 10' material='color: tomato; transparent: true; opacity: 0.4; side: double'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='text-box' material='shader: flat; color: green; opacity: 0.1' geometry='depth: 0.05'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='text' text='color: black; anchor: center; align: center; baseline: top; lineHeight: 55'></a-mixin>
			</a-assets>

			<!-- instructions -->
			<a-plane id='instructions' mixin='text-box' position='0 1.6 -1'>
				<a-text id='heading' mixin='text'></a-text>
				<a-text id='body' mixin='text' align='left'></a-text>
			</a-plane>

			<!-- next button -->
			<a-plane class='clickable' mixin='text-box' color='royalblue' height='0.25' width='1' position='0 2 -1'>
				<a-text mixin='text'width='3' baseline='center'></a-text>
			</a-plane>

			<!-- camera model -->
			<a-entity camera-model position='0 1.6 0' visible='false'>
				<a-box mixin='grey' position='0 0 0.4' height='0.3' width='0.2' depth='0.4'></a-box>
				<a-cone mixin='grey' radius-top='0.05' radius-bottom='0.1' height='0.2' rotation='90 0 0' position='0 0 0.1'></a-cone>

				<!-- FOV -->
				<a-circle id='v-fov' mixin='fov' rotation='0 90 0' theta-start='-45' theta-length='90'></a-circle>
				<a-circle id='h-fov' mixin='fov' rotation='90 0 0' theta-start='-150' theta-length='120'></a-circle>
			</a-entity>

			<!-- basic shapes -->
			<a-entity id='basic-shapes' visible='false'>
				<a-sphere position='0 1.25 -5' radius='1.25' color='#EF2D5E'></a-sphere>
				<a-box position='-1 0.5 -3' rotation='0 45 0' width='1' height='1' depth='1' color='#4CC3D9'></a-box>
				<a-cylinder position='1 0.75 -3' radius='0.5' height='1.5' color='#FFC65D'></a-cylinder>
				<a-circle rotation='-90 0 0' radius='10' color='#7BC8A4'></a-circle>
			</a-entity>

			<a-entity grid></a-entity>

			<a-entity camera-rig='length: 0; swivel: 0; elevation: 1.6; panTilt: 0 0'></a-entity>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<title>Basic Scene with Environment - A-Frame</title>
		<meta name="description" content="Basic Scene with Environment - A-Frame">
		<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
		<script src="https://unpkg.com/aframe-environment-component@1.1.0/dist/aframe-environment-component.min.js">
		</script>
	</head>

	<body>
		<!-- Try changing the preset to one of default, contact, egypt, checkerboard, forest, goaland, yavapai, goldmine, 
         threetowers, poison, arches, tron, japan, dream, volcano, starry, osiris. -->
		<!-- See more environment options: https://github.com/feiss/aframe-environment-component#parameters -->
		<a-scene environment="preset: egypt">
			<a-camera wasd-controls="acceleration:300">
				<a-cursor color="#FAFAFA"></a-cursor>
			</a-camera>
		</a-scene>
	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene fog="color: #772600; density: 0.04; far: 200; near: 0.1; type: exponential">
			<a-assets>
				<a-asset-item id="desert" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/gltf/rocky_desert/scene.gltf"></a-asset-item>
				<a-asset-item id="rover" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/gltf/mars_rover/scene.gltf"></a-asset-item>
				<a-asset-item id="orbital" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/gltf/orbital_station/scene.gltf"></a-asset-item>
			</a-assets>

			<a-entity position="-60 20 -100" rotation="-35 90 0" scale="1.2 1.2 1.2">
				<a-gltf-model color="orange" id="orbitalModel" src="#orbital" animation="property: rotation; to: 0 360 0; loop: true; easing: linear; dur: 50000"></a-gltf-model>
			</a-entity>

			<a-gltf-model src="#rover" position="3.5 -0.28 -2.1" rotation="-9.3 -23 4.2" scale="0.5 0.5 0.5"></a-gltf-model>

			<a-gltf-model src="#desert" position="19 1.8 -25" scale="100 100 100"></a-gltf-model>
			<a-gltf-model src="#desert" position="-80 1.2 -40" scale="100 100 100" rotation="0 90 0"></a-gltf-model>
			<a-gltf-model src="#desert" position="-55 2 56" scale="100 100 100" rotation="0 -90 0"></a-gltf-model>
			<a-gltf-model src="#desert" position="23 2.4 50" scale="100 100 100" rotation="0 90 0"></a-gltf-model>

			<a-sky rotation="0 -90 0" material="fog: false" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/img/red_sky.jpg"></a-sky>
			<a-camera position="2 1 -1" wasd-controls-enabled="false"></a-camera>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene>
			<a-assets>
				<a-mixin id='transparent' material='opacity: 0.5'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='red' material='color: red' rotation='0 0 -90' position='0.6 0 0'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='green' material='color: green' position='0 0.6 0'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='blue' material='color: blue' rotation='90 0 0' position='0 0 0.6'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='axis' geometry='radiusTop: 0.005; radiusBottom: 0.02; height: 1.2'></a-mixin>
			</a-assets>
			
			<a-entity rotation='0 60 0'>
				<a-entity position='0 0.6 -2'>
					<a-box mixin='transparent' color='skyblue'></a-box>
					<a-cone mixin='red axis'></a-cone>
					<a-cone mixin='green axis'></a-cone>
					<a-cone mixin='blue axis'></a-cone>
				</a-entity>
			</a-entity>

			<a-entity>
				<a-entity position='0 0.6 -2'>
					<a-cone mixin='transparent' color='gold'></a-cone>
					<a-cone mixin='red axis'></a-cone>
					<a-cone mixin='green axis'></a-cone>
					<a-cone mixin='blue axis'></a-cone>
				</a-entity>
			</a-entity>

			<a-entity rotation='0 -60 0'>
				<a-entity position='0 0.6 -2'>
					<a-torus mixin='transparent' color='tomato' radius='0.5' radius-tubular='0.1'></a-torus>
					<a-cone mixin='red axis'></a-cone>
					<a-cone mixin='green axis'></a-cone>
					<a-cone mixin='blue axis'></a-cone>
				</a-entity>
			</a-entity>

			<a-text position='0 2.4 -2' align='center' color='black' wrap-count='25' width='4' value='All objects have an orgin, i.e. pivot, just like for the scene, it is the point where 3 axis intersect.'></a-text>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src='https://unpkg.com/aframe-curve-component/dist/aframe-curve-component.min.js'></script>
		<script src='https://rawgit.com/mayognaise/aframe-mouse-cursor-component/master/dist/aframe-mouse-cursor-component.min.js'></script>
		<script src='script.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene background='color: whitesmoke' fog='color: whitesmoke; far: 15' cursor='rayOrigin: mouse' raycaster='objects: .clickable'>
			<a-assets>
				<a-mixin id='transparent' material='opacity: 0.5'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='red' material='color: red' rotation='0 0 -90' position='0.6 0 0'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='green' material='color: green' position='0 0.6 0'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='blue' material='color: blue' rotation='90 0 0' position='0 0 0.6'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='axis' geometry='radiusTop: 0.005; radiusBottom: 0.02; height: 1.2'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='text-box' material='shader: flat; color: green; opacity: 0.1'></a-mixin>
				<a-mixin id='text' text='color: black; anchor: center; align: center; baseline: top; lineHeight: 55; whiteSpace: pre'></a-mixin>
			</a-assets>

			<!-- instructions -->
			<a-plane id='instructions' mixin='text-box'>
				<a-text id='heading' mixin='text'></a-text>
				<a-text id='body' mixin='text' align='left' baseline='bottom'></a-text>
			</a-plane>

			<!-- next button -->
			<a-plane class='clickable' mixin='text-box' color='royalblue' height='0.25' width='1' position='0 2 -1'>
				<a-text mixin='text' width='3' baseline='center' wrap-count='15'></a-text>
			</a-plane>

			<a-entity grid></a-entity>

			<a-entity camera-rig></a-entity>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene>
			<!-- DNA sculpture -->
			<a-entity position='0 0 -3'>
				<!-- base -->
				<a-cylinder color='silver' radius='1.6' height='0.4' position='0 0.2 0'></a-cylinder>

				<!-- plate -->
				<a-box height='0.2' depth='0.2' position='0 0.4 1' rotation='-45 0 0'>
					<a-text value='Deoxyribonucleic Acid' color='black' width='2' align='center' position='0 0 0.1'></a-text>
				</a-box>

				<!-- segment -->
				<a-entity position='0 0.5 0'>
					<a-cylinder rotation='0 0 90' radius='0.05' height='2' color='skyblue'></a-cylinder>
					<a-sphere position='-1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='tomato'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='47 0 0' color='goldenrod'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='goldenrod'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='-47 0 0' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
				</a-entity>

				<!-- segment -->
				<a-entity position='0 1 0' rotation='0 30 0'>
					<a-cylinder rotation='0 0 90' radius='0.05' height='2' color='skyblue'></a-cylinder>
					<a-sphere position='-1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='tomato'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='47 0 0' color='goldenrod'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='goldenrod'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='-47 0 0' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
				</a-entity>
				
				<!-- segment -->
				<a-entity position='0 1.5 0' rotation='0 60 0'>
					<a-cylinder rotation='0 0 90' radius='0.05' height='2' color='skyblue'></a-cylinder>
					<a-sphere position='-1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='tomato'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='47 0 0' color='goldenrod'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='goldenrod'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='-47 0 0' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
				</a-entity>

				<!-- segment -->
				<a-entity position='0 2 0' rotation='0 90 0'>
					<a-cylinder rotation='0 0 90' radius='0.05' height='2' color='skyblue'></a-cylinder>
					<a-sphere position='-1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='tomato'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='47 0 0' color='goldenrod'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='goldenrod'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='-47 0 0' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
				</a-entity>

				<!-- segment -->
				<a-entity position='0 2.5 0' rotation='0 120 0'>
					<a-cylinder rotation='0 0 90' radius='0.05' height='2' color='skyblue'></a-cylinder>
					<a-sphere position='-1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='tomato'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='47 0 0' color='goldenrod'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='goldenrod'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='-47 0 0' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
				</a-entity>

				<!-- segment -->
				<a-entity position='0 3 0' rotation='0 150 0'>
					<a-cylinder rotation='0 0 90' radius='0.05' height='2' color='skyblue'></a-cylinder>
					<a-sphere position='-1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='tomato'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='47 0 0' color='goldenrod'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='goldenrod'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='-47 0 0' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
				</a-entity>

				<!-- segment -->
				<a-entity position='0 3.5 0' rotation='0 180 0'>
					<a-cylinder rotation='0 0 90' radius='0.05' height='2' color='skyblue'></a-cylinder>
					<a-sphere position='-1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='tomato'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='47 0 0' color='goldenrod'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='1 0 0' radius='0.2' color='goldenrod'>
						<a-cylinder height='0.77' radius='0.1' rotation='-47 0 0' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
					</a-sphere>
				</a-entity>
			</a-entity>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
		<script src="script.js"></script>
	</head>
	<body>

		<a-scene background='color: khaki'>
			<a-entity position='0 0.8 -3'>
				<a-cylinder cursor-listener position='0 0.6 0' scale='0.3 0.2 0.3' color='tomato'></a-cylinder>
				<a-cylinder radius='0.35' color='silver' position='0 0.05 0'></a-cylinder>
				<a-box></a-box>
			</a-entity>

			<a-camera>
				<a-cursor fuse='true' position='0 0 -0.01' scale='0.01 0.01 0.01'></a-cursor>
			</a-camera>
		</a-scene>

	</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
		<script src="script.js"></script>
	</head>
	<body>

		<a-scene background='color: wheat' fog='color: wheat; far: 10'>
			<!-- pillars -->
			<a-cylinder radius='0.5' position='0 1 -2' height='2'></a-cylinder>
			<a-cylinder radius='0.5' position='-2 2 -4' height='4'></a-cylinder>
			<a-cylinder radius='0.5' position='1 3 -5' height='6'></a-cylinder>
			<a-cylinder radius='0.5' position='1 1.5 -3' height='3'></a-cylinder>
			<a-cylinder radius='0.5' position='-2 2.5 1' height='5'></a-cylinder>

			<!-- waypoints -->
			<a-dodecahedron onclick='teleport()' position='0 3.6 -2' radius='0.2' color='tomato'></a-dodecahedron>
			<a-dodecahedron position='-2 5.6 -4' radius='0.2' color='gold'></a-dodecahedron>
			<a-dodecahedron position='1 7.6 -5' radius='0.2' color='gold'></a-dodecahedron>
			<a-dodecahedron position='1 4.6 -3' radius='0.2' color='gold'></a-dodecahedron>
			<a-dodecahedron position='-2 6.6 1' radius='0.2' color='gold'></a-dodecahedron>

			<!-- floor -->
			<a-circle radius='15' color='palegreen' rotation='-90 0 0'></a-circle>

			<!-- viewer -->
			<a-camera wasd-controls-enabled='false'>
				<a-cursor fuse='true' fuse-timeout='500' position='0 0 -0.01' scale='0.01 0.01 0.01'></a-cursor>
			</a-camera>
		</a-scene>

	</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src='script.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>
		<!-- fog -->
		<a-scene background='color: slategray' fog='color: slategray; far: 15; near: 0.1;'>
			
			<a-box position='0 0.4 -3' height='0.8' color='tomato' shadow></a-box>
			<a-dodecahedron id='lightTarget' position='0 1.05 -3' radius='0.5' color='gold' metalness='0.8' shadow></a-dodecahedron>

			<!-- ambient light -->
			<a-light type='ambient' intensity='0.1'></a-light>

			<!-- directional light -->
			<a-light type='directional' intensity='0.2' position='-4 3 4' target='#lightTarget'></a-light>

			<!-- point lights -->
			<a-light type='point' color='purple' intensity='0.3' distance='10' position='0 4 -3'></a-light>
			<a-light type='point' color='lightgreen' intensity='0.3' distance='10' position='3 4 -6'></a-light>
			<a-light type='point' color='lightblue' intensity='0.3' distance='10' position='-3 4 -6'></a-light>

			<!-- standing floor lamp -->
			<a-entity rotation='0 45 0' position='-1.5 0 -4.5'>
				<a-cone position='0 3 0' rotation='-45 0 0' height='0.5' radius-top='0.3' radius-bottom='0.5'>
					<!-- spot light -->
					<a-light type='spot' color='khaki' intensity='0.4' angle='30' penumbra='0.2' light='castShadow: true' target='#lightTarget'></a-light>
					<!-- point light -->
					<a-light type='point' color='khaki' intensity='2' distance='2' position='0 -0.5 0'></a-light>
				</a-cone>
				<!-- neck -->
				<a-cylinder position='0 1.5 -0.3 0' color='black' radius='0.05' height='3'></a-cylinder>
				<!-- base -->
				<a-cylinder position='0 0.05 0' radius='0.6' color='black' height='0.1'></a-cylinder>
			</a-entity>

			<!-- roof -->
			<a-circle position='0 5 0' color='silver' rotation='90 0 0' radius='25' roughness='0.8'></a-circle>

			<!-- floor -->
			<a-circle rotation='-90 0 0' radius='25' color='silver' roughness='1' shadow></a-circle>

			<!-- background cubes -->
		</a-scene>
	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.3/aframe.min.js"></script>
		<script src="script.js"></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene animation-timeline="timeline: #park-car">
			<a-assets>
				<a-asset-item id="cityLink" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/gltf/low_poly_city/scene.gltf"></a-asset-item>
				<a-asset-item id="carLink" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/gltf/low_poly_car/scene.gltf"></a-asset-item>
			</a-assets>

			<a-gltf-model id="city" src="#cityLink"></a-gltf-model>
			<a-gltf-model id="car" src="#carLink" position="15 0 -16" animation__key1="property: position; dur: 3000; to: 0 0 -5; easing: linear" keyframes></a-gltf-model>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene background='color: lightcoral'>
			<a-box position='0 1.5 -2' color='lightblue' animation='property: rotation; to: 0 90 0; loop: true; easing: linear'></a-box>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src="https://unpkg.com/aframe-curve-component/dist/aframe-curve-component.min.js"></script>
		<script src="https://rawgit.com/protyze/aframe-alongpath-component/master/dist/aframe-alongpath-component.min.js"></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene>
			<!-- the curve -->
			<a-curve id="track1" curve="closed: true">
				<a-curve-point position="-4 1 -8"></a-curve-point>
				<a-curve-point position="-3 1 -3"></a-curve-point>
				<a-curve-point position="3 1 -3"></a-curve-point>
				<a-curve-point position="4 1 -8"></a-curve-point>
			</a-curve>

			<!-- draw the Curve -->
			<a-draw-curve curveref="#track1" material="color: red"></a-draw-curve>

			<!-- big pacman -->
			<a-entity alongpath="curve: #track1; loop: true; dur: 10000; delay: 0; rotate: true">
				<!-- upper hemispere -->
				<a-sphere theta-length="90" color="gold" rotation="-30 0 0">
					<!-- eyes -->
					<a-sphere position='0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='-0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>

					<a-circle rotation="90 0 0" color="gold"></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation="90 0 0" color="black" radius="0.8" position="0 -0.01 0"></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>

				<!-- lower hemisphere -->
				<a-sphere theta-start="90" color="gold" rotation="30 0 0">
					<a-circle rotation="-90 0 0" color="gold"></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation="-90 0 0" color="black" radius="0.8" position="0 0.01 0"></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>
			</a-entity>

			<!-- small pacman 1 -->
			<a-entity scale="0.5 0.5 0.5" alongpath="curve: #track1; loop: true; dur: 10000; delay: 600; rotate: true">
				<!-- upper hemispere -->
				<a-sphere theta-length="90" color="gold" rotation="-30 0 0">
					<!-- eyes -->
					<a-sphere position='0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='-0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>

					<a-circle rotation="90 0 0" color="gold"></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation="90 0 0" color="black" radius="0.8" position="0 -0.01 0"></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>
			
				<!-- lower hemisphere -->
				<a-sphere theta-start="90" color="gold" rotation="30 0 0">
					<a-circle rotation="-90 0 0" color="gold"></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation="-90 0 0" color="black" radius="0.8" position="0 0.01 0"></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>
			</a-entity>

			<!-- small pacman 2 -->
			<a-entity scale="0.5 0.5 0.5" alongpath="curve: #track1; loop: true; dur: 10000; delay: 1000; rotate: true">
				<!-- upper hemispere -->
				<a-sphere theta-length="90" color="gold" rotation="-30 0 0">
					<!-- eyes -->
					<a-sphere position='0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='-0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>
					
					<a-circle rotation="90 0 0" color="gold"></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation="90 0 0" color="black" radius="0.8" position="0 -0.01 0"></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>

				<!-- lower hemisphere -->
				<a-sphere theta-start="90" color="gold" rotation="30 0 0">
					<a-circle rotation="-90 0 0" color="gold"></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation="-90 0 0" color="black" radius="0.8" position="0 0.01 0"></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>
			</a-entity>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src="https://aframe.io/releases/0.9.0/aframe.min.js"></script>
		<script src="https://cdn.rawgit.com/donmccurdy/aframe-physics-system/v4.0.1/dist/aframe-physics-system.min.js"></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene physics='debug: true'>

			<a-entity position='1 1 -4' rotation='0 35 0'>
				<a-sphere dynamic-body radius='0.35' position='-2 6 -4' color='orange'></a-sphere>
				<a-sphere dynamic-body radius='0.32' position='-1 5 -4' color='orange'></a-sphere>
				<a-sphere dynamic-body radius='0.34' position='0 6 -4' color='orange'></a-sphere>
				<a-sphere dynamic-body radius='0.37' position='1 5 -4' color='orange'></a-sphere>
				<a-sphere dynamic-body radius='0.39' position='2 6 -4' color='orange'></a-sphere>

				<a-box static-body position='0 0 0' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 0.5 -0.5' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 1 -1' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 1.5 -1.5' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 2 -2' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 2.5 -2.5' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 3 -3' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 3.5 -3.5' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 4 -4' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 4.5 -4.5' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
				<a-box static-body position='0 5 -5' width='5' height='0.5' depth='0.5' color='dimgrey'></a-box>
			</a-entity>

			<a-cylinder static-body height='1' radius='20' color="#7BC8A4"></a-cylinder>

		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src="https://cdn.rawgit.com/donmccurdy/aframe-physics-system/v4.0.1/dist/aframe-physics-system.min.js"></script>
		<script src='https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aframe-physics-extras@0.1.3/dist/aframe-physics-extras.js'></script>
		<script src='script.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene physics='debug: false' background='color: lightblue'>

			<!-- pacman -->
			<a-entity position='-6 1 -6' rotation='0 90 0' animation='property: position; to: 6 1 -6; dur: 5000; easing: linear'>
				<!-- upper hemispere -->
				<a-sphere class='pacman' static-body physics-collider theta-length='90' color='gold' rotation='-30 0 0' animation='property: rotation; to: 0 0 0; dir: alternate; dur: 300; loop: true; easing: linear'>
					<!-- eyes -->
					<a-sphere position='0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>
					<a-sphere position='-0.65 0.4 0.3' radius='0.25' color='black'></a-sphere>

					<a-circle rotation='90 0 0' color='gold'></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation='90 0 0' color='black' radius='0.8' position='0 -0.01 0'></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>

				<!-- lower hemisphere -->
				<a-sphere class='pacman' static-body physics-collider theta-start='90' color='gold' rotation='30 0 0' animation='property: rotation; to: 0 0 0; dir: alternate; dur: 300; loop: true; easing: linear'>
					<a-circle rotation='-90 0 0' color='gold'></a-circle>
					<a-circle rotation='-90 0 0' color='black' radius='0.8' position='0 0.01 0'></a-circle>
				</a-sphere>
			</a-entity>

			<!-- pills -->
			<a-sphere destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='-2 1 -6' radius='0.3' color='tomato'></a-sphere>
			<a-sphere destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='0 1 -6' radius='0.3' color='tomato'></a-sphere>
			<a-sphere destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='2 1 -6' radius='0.3' color='tomato'></a-sphere>

		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src='https://cdn.rawgit.com/donmccurdy/aframe-physics-system/v4.0.1/dist/aframe-physics-system.min.js'></script>
		<script src='https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aframe-physics-extras@0.1.3/dist/aframe-physics-extras.js'></script>
		<script src='script.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene physics='debug: false' background='color: lightblue'>

			<a-assets>
				<audio id='coin-collect-link' src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/sounds/coin-collect.wav' prelaod='auto' crossorigin='anonymous'></audio>
				<audio id='game-loop-link' src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/educationbsd/educationbsd/master/sounds/video-game-music.wav' prelaod='auto' crossorigin='anonymous'></audio>
			</a-assets>

			<!-- pacman -->
			<a-entity pacman></a-entity>

			<!-- pills -->
			<a-sphere destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='-2 1 -6' radius='0.3' color='tomato'></a-sphere>
			<a-sphere destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='0 1 -6' radius='0.3' color='tomato'></a-sphere>
			<a-sphere destroy-on-hit static-body physics-collider position='2 1 -6' radius='0.3' color='tomato'></a-sphere>

			<!-- sounds -->
			<a-sound id='coin-collect' src='#coin-collect-link' on='start'></a-sound>
			<a-sound src='#game-loop-link' autoplay='true' loop='true'></a-sound>

		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src='script.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene background='color: lightblue'>
			<a-assets>
				<audio id='bounce-link' src='https://media.vocaroo.com/mp3/lihOJ5wBVa7' prelaod='auto' ></audio>
			</a-assets>

			<a-text value='Press SPACE key to toggle sound' align='center' position='0 3 -2' color='royalblue'></a-text>

			<a-entity bounce>
				<a-sphere color='tomato' position='0 0.5 0' radius='0.5'></a-sphere>
				<a-circle color='black' position='-0.15 0.65 0.5' radius='0.06'></a-circle>
				<a-circle color='black' position='0.15 0.65 0.5' radius='0.06'></a-circle>
			</a-entity>

			<a-sound id='bounce-sound' src='#bounce-link' on='flat'></a-sound>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

	<head>
		<script src='https://aframe.io/releases/1.0.0/aframe.min.js'></script>
		<script src='script.js'></script>
	</head>

	<body>

		<a-scene background='color: lightblue'>
			<a-sphere color='tomato' position='0 0.5 -3' radius='0.5'
				animation='property: '></a-sphere>
		</a-scene>

	</body>

</html>
